name: Bouncy Ball Wall
description:
Bouncy Ball Wall - Game Ware 1

This is a minigame that I develop in 5 days to challenge myself. I don't have a theme in mind when I do this kind of projects, I think of a hyper-casual game idea and give it my personal twist.

Only drag and drop the ball with a mouse click and make it bounce one wall to another to add points, if you grab a coin you gain 5 extra points and once in a while appear the mega coin, grab it and you will gain 10 coins and a lot of points.

Hope you like it.
